cab.content: From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 27th. June 1917. [Repeated to Cox, Baglidad) as No: 740 S.) (Received at India Office, 11,50 p.m.) Secret. Your telegram, of the 20th June. Substitute for Clayton.Apart from question of his health and personal inclinations, we should findit most inconvenient to spare Dobbs, who is Revenue Commissioner,Baluchistan, with prospect of succeeding Ramsay as Agent to the Governor-General in December.
